title: Ruth’s Loyalty to Naomi
summary: Ruth 1 tells how Naomi loses her husband and sons in Moab. Her Moabite daughter-in-law Ruth chooses to stay with her and return to Bethlehem, declaring her loyalty to Naomi and her God.

faq.question: Why did Naomi return to Bethlehem?
faq.answer: Because the famine in Israel had ended and she had no family left in Moab.

faq.question: What did Ruth say to show her commitment?
faq.answer: ‘Where you go I will go… your people will be my people and your God my God.’
